official-title.#text:
To provide for the transfer of certain public land
		  currently administered by the Bureau of Land Management to the administrative
		  jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Army for inclusion in White Sands Missile
		  Range, New Mexico, and for other purposes.

introduced

, for a
			 period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

short-title.#text:
White Sands Missile Range Security
			 Enhancement Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Transfer of
			 administrative jurisdiction, White Sands Missile Range, New Mexico

shall transfer to the
			 administrative jurisdiction of the

certain public land
			 administered by the

in Dona Ana County, New Mexico,
			 consisting of approximately 5,100 acres depicted as

quote.#text: White Sands Missile Range Land Reservation
